remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course.Thursday /9:00~12:00，B105, IoC, AS
remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。四/9:00~12:00，中研院化學所B105

goal.en: Concepts and General Principles of Analytical Chemistry
goal.ch: Concepts and General Principles of Analytical Chemistry

content.en:
1. Chemical Bonding
2. Biochip - Microarray and microfluidic chip
3. SPR sensing
4. XPS
5. SIMS
6. Foundamental of Mass Spectrometry
7. Application of mass spectrometry to biology and
8. Nanotechnology
9. NMR spectroscopy-foundamental and application
10. Modern NMR techonolgy-Hand-on experience
11. Fundamentals of Light Microscopy
12. Super-resolution Light Microscopy
